posts.post_content: Looking for this card for my reds HOF collection

Bad news:
I'm pretty sure that there are no Old Judges cards of the great pitcher Will White.  He finished his short career in 1886, before the large Old Judge set (N172) was issued in 1887-90, and the much smaller set from 1886 did not include him or any players from the American Association,  where the Cincy team was played.
William Dightin White is the White in the Old Judge set that you are thinking of. That is not the Cincinnati pitcher. Different Will White.
Thanks for the information so it looks like I'm going to have to find a cabinet photo of will white
